column3: â€œ1 bowl had me in the 7th dimension riding my space camelâ€

â€œVery nice strain. I found myself watching Quantico the tv show for hours on Hulu. This strain will leave you very relaxed yet not so relaxed to where you get that dreaded couch lock" effect (although some days I don't mind that lol). It's an earthy taste and smooth on the lungs.

column1: I feel like I got more of an Indica for this hybrid in my personal batch and would love to try one that's more Sativa than Incica.

column3:
â€œThis is one of my top 3 favorite strains of weed. I first tried it in January, and after that, it instantly became one of my favorites. This particular plant had a smooth feeling to it
it doesnt take much to get high off ot itâ€
â€œGreat great weed. You feel the high after 3-4 hits, endives euphoria very wellâ€
â€œJust recently tried this for the first time. Five people on half a G blunt and I was gone. Next step, to have a G to myself for a night. I thought ATF was some shit, this is some major shit.â€

â€œCali Kush lives up to its rep..
Just got home from work, and packed up a bowl of OG. This bud is so nice, with it's golden orange colored trichomes, and a sweet, lemon-citrus-pine aroma that is very deep and complex. As you squeeze and break up the flowers, the scent releases more, and can get quite aromatic, leaving fingers coated with the smell for a long time. Plus, you can't beat the one hit quit potency of Cali ...â€
â€œnice and relaxed but still feel upliftedâ€

â€œgood strain for pain stress and insomnia smells sweet buds are tight making for a good smoke tastes are a sweet nutty taste with earthy after tones great for just sitting back and relaxing before bed or after a long day at work stress and pain melt awayâ€
â€œGood amount of energy and beatnessâ€
â€œThis is my new favorite strain over a well grown Great white shark. Cali Kush looks like it was dipped in keifâ€
â€œvery uplifting and energetic, euphoricâ€
â€œA sweet honeydew summer type bud...lots of delicious orange hairs,.light green like yoda..Yoda loves Cali Kushâ€

â€œHey y'all, strain of the day today is cali kush . This is a hybrid strain that pending on the batch, it may lean more #indica or more sativa heavy.  These particular nuggets were way indica dominant . The flowers are large dense deep green orange haired beauties that have very few leaves and are packed with resious buds and trichomes. The aroma is complex. Its scent is a pungent earthy, cannabis scent with hints of c...â€
â€œGreat hybrid, lots of flavour, and definitely potent!â€
â€œI've found this strain to make me extremely thoughtful and artistically creative. easily one of the best highs I've had.â€
â€œNice light head buzz. Inspirational high while comfortably relaxing. Definitely enjoyable. Cheers!â€
â€œHad about two bowls after about 2 weeks without any smoking, I honestly though I was back in preschool.. colours everywhere.. fantastic Budâ€
â€œGreat hybrid, lots of flavour, and definitely potent!â€
â€œA sweet honeydew summer type bud...lots of delicious orange hairs,.light green like yoda..Yoda loves Cali Kushâ€
â€œI love this one a lot. Very much a sativa uplift right after vaping, with a nice kushy indica finish about 15min after vaping.â€

â€œMy friend and I smoked this mixed with a bit of some other sativa out of a bong. It was crazy, the highest I've ever been in my life. I was just sitting there in the car, thinking. My thoughts were insane and I made all these realizations that don't even make sense to me now that I'm sober. I didn't necessarily feel happy, just really relaxed and at peace. I was super giggly and my friend and I laughed so hard at ran...â€

â€œReally fuckin' good. Top 5 for me at the moment. Beautiful lookin' bugs, smells beautiful, and just looks good. And then you smoke it and you find out it smokes as good as it smells and looks. Don't pass this up if you see it.â€
â€œsmoked a lot and felt little. Disappointing because of the fact that people had told me they really loved it. Still a okay head high thoughâ€
â€œNice Smell , doesnt look killer until smoked :)â€
â€œAmazing stuff, surprisingly potent with a crisp refreshing flavor.â€

â€œThe name says it all. It's a very strong weed with a beautiful aroma. Taste very sweet with a very soft hint of wood flavor. I immediately feel high and a sense of euphoria that kicks in right away. I immediately feel it straight to the dome and it's a beautiful sense of awakening for your morning and it's indica effects relax you and ease you from anxiety and pain. Very good strain. Never go wrong with this pick.  ~...â€

â€œPuff puff and relax,this strain got a euphoric but relaxed high,like we say in Brazil, Ta espancando !
Very good strain.â€
â€œNice indica strain with a sweet citrus heavy earthy aroma.â€
â€œgood strain gets you very goofy and stoned, also gives you munchies like crazy and makes you VERY sleepyâ€

â€œVery mellow weed with a strong licorice flavor as you exhale. A decent enough body buzz but a significant amount of dry mouth with this one. You'll want a slurpee or something to keep you hydrated.â€
â€œnice head buzz and beautiful dank  smell good for chillingâ€

â€œThe Amazing Carl at LivWell in Trinidad hooked me up with this as the best match for my requirements: tastes good, lasts long, and goes straight to the head. It totally delivers. I have to be careful if I smoke this before work or I get a bit idgaf-y. It's a great evening bud. Goes well with most wines and chianti...â€

 the zestiness must be the sweetness, zestiness is almost like lemon haze but not soo zesty
there is a balence between sweet and earthy/pungent the thing ...â€

â€œHeavy indica, you can really taste the kush pungent taste when smoked. Definitely a couch locking heavy indica, would recommend for night time use. Very Pungent, with a purple hue to the flower.â€
â€œMy husband and I smoked a little before bed and we were all over each other. Got rid of the days stress immediatelyâ€

â€œOverall pretty great strain, gave me an uplifting high with anxiety relief. It was really great finally finding strain locally.â€

I buy 19.7 g for 90$ (yeah bitch I live in Quebec haha) I took between 8 and 12 hit from the bong and I had a pretty trip for a good hour but no longer than that (because I smoke a lot lol) and this kind is pretty amazing, because after 2-3 hit you feel a good sativa buzz, feels like ready to work but after 7-8-9 other hit you will be just soo fucking high cauz its ...â€

â€œWow-- I took one hit off a select strains C02 cartridge before taking a walk.  I got about a block from my house and felt an intense need to get right to my couch.  I walked home, forgot how to open our gate, ate all the Chex party mix that we made for a Christmas party, then sat down.... and the carpet started to move and make shapes.  I saw faces, the sound from our speakers made pulsing waves of color...  Seriousl...â€

â€œWonderful stuff . I had the pleasure of making this my first grow. I started due to bad pain in my leg and back. 
And yes it doesnâ€™t the trick. Itâ€™s smooth and tasty, made the pain gone . I was able to do the dishes and get some stuff done. 
I would recommend this in the afternoon or for evenings. Itâ€™s does make you feel a bit heavy (tried) but nothing a good cup of coffee doesnâ€™t fix. 
I would recommend this for pai...â€
â€œNice strain, really smooth to smoke, great to rip through a bong.â€
â€œNot good for pain relief and honestly didn't get me much of a head buzz either not impressed.Have to give 2 stars on the fact that it is a smooth smoke and has an earthy taste.â€

â€œGrown near San Fransisco, my stash is a slightly higher potency(15-18% thc) and definitely a sativa dominant phenotype. Very dense budz. Some measure 5-6 grams. Sweet woody taste. High can be day or evening. No couch lock. Sativa feel for entire high with indica characteristics existing as you settle in. Feels like a tuesday afternoon at Zuma Beach with nothing to do but live.â€
â€œHappy, euphoric. The high crept up on me, but honestly didnâ€™t last long. Head high. Definite hybrid. Relaxed. Couch locked. MUNCHIES. Not my favorite, but pretty good.â€

I will vape half, the other half is for cooking.â€

Taste is what I like most about this one she's very earthy like a mouth full of coffee.. Earthyâ˜•ï¸... The best taste for a kush strain (;...â€

column4: at least not early on. I guess the sativa properties of the hybrid keep you awake (although there isn't much of a "head" high or energy spark you usually get from a sativa strain.) Bud is beautiful

â€œSmoked one j and I was feeling amazing. After smoking some more I had a crazy high that lasted a long time. Gave me a serious case of the munchies which was good because I don't eat a lot. All my depression, stess, and pain went right away. I would highly recommend this.â€
â€œGood but I had to smoke quite a bit before I got to where I wanted to be. The taste was unique and I used this to relax after a long day of work and it did its jobâ€

â€œThis strain was nice to smoke I found it quite light and uplifting quite euphoric. The buds are large, dense and light green with nice orange hairs, the buds are fairly coated in crystals and has a sweet sickly aroma with sour undertones. The bud taste slightly sour with sweet exhales. 

The bud was fairly light for me however would be good for moderate depression as it's uplifting and relaxing, it would also be good...â€
â€œCool strain, def. a little different esp. taste and smell.  Buds were nice also, just didn't have the staying power of other kush strains I've used.â€

â€œNot really happy with this strain. Would go for plain OG instead.â€
â€œMakes me creative when editing film. Dope ass strain yoâ€

â€œNot a particular fan of Cali Kush. Found it to be a regular Kush strain nothing special or spectacular but most definitly did the job. Felt very relaxed almost to a point of too relaxed. Buds were small and a tad leafy and loose for my liking. Didn't pack the usual Kush punch you're looking for. Not saying it's bad just wasn't my favourite. 

OVERALL GRADE : 7.5./10â€
â€œQuick high...not for very long.â€
â€œEnjoyed the aroma of the plant extremely soothingâ€
â€œStrong couch lock like high good evening smoke.â€
